UserPromptSubmit.prompt: Scan the user's message for lore-related content (locations, characters, factions, culture, technology, food, flora, professions, history, or any Whisker Shogunate world-building). If detected, remind Claude to activate Lore Co-Pilot Mode: search related lore, check world rules, draft an entry, and offer to save. Be proactive and eager.

PreToolUse.prompt:
Before creating this lore entry, verify:
1. search_lore was called first to check for duplicates/related content
2. Content follows world rules:
   - No mammal meat (fish/seafood only)
   - No toxic foods (grapes, onions, chocolate, garlic don't exist)
   - Whisker-Punk aesthetic (visible, ornate, cat-scaled tech)
   - Warm palette (natural woods, brass/copper/bronze)
   - No violence (conflicts via mediation/social pressure)
   - No clear villains (only complex characters)
   - Don't explain magical realism elements
3. Draft was shown to user and approved

If violations found, suggest corrections before saving.

Before updating this lore entry, verify the changes follow world rules:
- No mammal meat, no toxic foods
- Whisker-Punk aesthetic, warm palette
- No violence, no clear villains
- Don't explain magical elements

If violations found, suggest corrections.

PostToolUse.prompt:
Entry saved! Now provide:
1. Confirmation with entry ID
2. Connections - search for 3-5 related entries that might reference or be referenced by this new content
3. Next steps - suggest 2-3 gaps this creates (characters, locations, items, etc.) that could be filled next
